name: Moldering Devil
movement: 30 feet walking, 40 feet flying with limitations
description: The Moldering Devil is a small fiend with a decaying, insidious appearance, capable of corrupting food and water around it. It can fly but must land safely on solid surfaces.
memorable: Its ability to render food and drink poisonous makes it a dangerous adversary, especially in survival situations.
goals: To corrupt food and drink, creating hazardous environments for unsuspecting creatures.
relations: It may be encountered alongside other fiends or in infernal domains.
environment: Often found in dark, corrupted areas where it can take advantage of its toxic abilities.
strengths: Immunity to fire and poison damage, and the ability to create hazardous conditions.
weaknesses: Low Charisma makes it ineffective in social interactions.
attacks: It attacks with a bite that deals piercing and necrotic damage.
most_powerful_ability: Touch of Rot - instantly decays food and drink, poisoning those who consume it.
senses: Possesses Devil's Sight, allowing it to see in magical darkness as if it were dim light.
skills: Has a perceptive advantage with a +2 to Perception, enhancing its awareness.
additional_information: Can fly up to 40 feet on its turn.
Corruption spreads upon its demise, affecting nearby food and water.
Its presence is marked by a decay in nearby consumables.
test_queries: poisonous flying fiend with decaying touch
small devil that corrupts food and drink
hazardous poison devil in the darkness
creature that poisons food and has necrotic bites
